A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 1.5 stars. Spoilers are coming next\, reader beware. Soooooo many plot holes\, 30 years we waited to see some cool Luke Skywalker scenes and we were let down. No cool training scenes with Rey and they even screwed his death up. Buckle up for the new PC star wars. The next star wars I watch will be on Kodi through my amazon fire stick. Fool me once and fooled me twice.
